title: Book of Skulls
summaries: The Book of Skulls is a magic weapon that fires slow flaming skull projectiles. Each skull can pierce twice, dissipating on its third enemy impact. The skulls do not ricochet, and disappear upon colliding with objects, but they have a fairly strong homing ability on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version. They also emit a fair amount of light. The Book of Skulls has a 10.5*36/343 (10.5%) / 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance to drop from Skeletron.

A Shadowflame variant of the Book of Skulls is used by the Clothier NPC to protect himself on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version.
